attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1PyUari-oTPloymb_description
attribs.current:
No 1° nível, você escolhe um tipo de dragão como seu ancestral. O tipo de dano associado a cada dragão será usado por características que você ganhará posteriormente.

Verde Veneno Cone de 4,5m (teste de Con)

Você pode falar, ler e escrever em Dracônico. Além disso, sempre que você fizer um teste de Carisma quando estiver interagindo com dragões, seu bônus de proficiência será dobrado se ele se aplicar a esse teste.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1PyYL6rtSQf5MD-M_description
attribs.current:
A partir do 6° nível, uma vez por turno, quando você causar dano do tipo associado ao seu ancestral Dracônico, você pode adicionar o seu modificador de carisma ao dano causado.
Além disso, você pode gastar 1 ponto de feitiçaria e se tornar resistente ao tipo de dano do seu Ancestral Dracônico por 1 hora. Caso você já possuí a resistência a esse tipo graças a alguma característica racial, ao invés disso você se torna imune por esse tempo.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1Pyb73t2g27JmLXz_description
attribs.current:
No 14° nível, você adquire a habilidade de brotar um par de asas de dragão das suas costas, ganhando deslocamento de voo igual ao seu deslocamento atual. Você pode criar essas asas com uma ação bônus, no seu turno. Elas duram até que vocêas dissipe, com uma ação bônus no seu turno.
Você não pode manifestar suas asas quando estiver vestindo uma armadura, a não ser que a armadura seja feita para acomodá-las, e roupas que não forem feitas para se acomodar às suas asas devem ser destruídas quando você manifestá-las.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1PyemxyccUDZx7vj_description
attribs.current:
A partir do 18° nível, você pode canalizar a assustadora forma do seu ancestral dracônico. Para isso, você deve utilizar uma ação bônus e 6 pontos de feitiçaria e receberá os seguintes benefícios:

Sua CA é aumentada em 2, você não pode ser enfeitiçado ou amedrontado, seu tamanho se torna grande, se você já não for grande ou maior e você recebe pontos de vida temporários iguais a 2 vezes seu nível.

Seu valor de Força se torna o mesmo que o de Carisma, se ele for menor, você recebe garras dracônicas, na qual você é proficiente, que são consideradas mágicas para o proposito de ignorar resistência ao dano. Elas são baseadas em Força e causam 2d8 + Modificador de Força de dano cortante. Quando utilizar a ação Atacar, você pode realizar 2 ataques.

Por fim, consumindo 3 Pontos de Feitiçaria, você pode reutilizar sua Arma de Sopro Mágica, caso já a tenha usado. Além disso, sua Arma de Sopro Mágica tem sua área expandida de acordo com a seguinte forma:

 Linhas se tornam 3m/18m ;
 Cones se tornam 9m;
 Esferas se tornam 4,5m de raio.

Você permanece nessa forma por 1 minuto. Ela termina caso fique incapacitado, caso morra, ou se a desfizer como uma ação bônus

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1Tvkh-pkefxvivyO_description
attribs.current:
1st-level sorcerer feature (enhances Spellcasting)

Whenever you finish a long rest, you can replace one spell you learned from this Spellcasting feature with another spell from the sorcerer spell list. The new spell must be the same level as the spell you replace.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1TvmH2Kg7FTY4txv_description
attribs.current:
At 2nd level, you tap into a deep wellspring of magic within yourself. This wellspring is represented by sorcery points, which allow you to create a variety of magical effects.

Sorcery Points PHB p99[–] You have 2 sorcery points, and you gain one additional point every time you level up, to a maximum of 20 at level 20. You can never have more sorcery points than shown on the table for your level. You regain all spent sorcery points when you finish a long rest.

Flexible Casting PHB p99[–] You can use your sorcery points to gain additional spell slots, or sacrifice spell slots to gain additional sorcery points. You learn other ways to use your sorcery points as you reach higher levels.

Creating Spell Slots. You can transform unexpended sorcery points into one spell slot as a bonus action on your turn. The created spell slots vanish at the end of a long rest. The Creating Spell Slots table shows the cost of creating a spell slot of a given level. You can create spell slots no higher in level than 5th.

Creating Spell SlotsSpell Slot Level | Sorcery Point Cost | 
1st | 2 | 
2nd | 3 | 
3rd | 5 | 
4th | 6 | 
5th | 7 | 
Converting a Spell Slot to Sorcery Points. As a bonus action on your turn, you can expend one spell slot and gain a number of sorcery points equal to the slot's level.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1TvtF3ZtCIqt7dDA_description
attribs.current:
At 3rd level, you gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain two of the following Metamagic options of your choice. You gain another one at 10th and 17th level.

You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.

Careful Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, you can protect some of those creatures from the spell's full force. To do so, you spend 1 sorcery point and choose a number of those creatures up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature). A chosen creature automatically succeeds on its saving throw against the spell.

Distant Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell that has a range of 5 feet or greater, you can spend 1 sorcery point to double the range of the spell.

When you cast a spell that has a range of touch, you can spend 1 sorcery point to make the range of the spell 30 feet.

Empowered Spell PHB p102[–] When you roll damage for a spell, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll a number of the damage dice up to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one). You must use the new rolls.

You can use Empowered Spell even if you have already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.

Extended Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell that has a duration of 1 minute or longer, you can spend 1 sorcery point to double its duration, to a maximum duration of 24 hours.

Heightened Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist its effects, you can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw made against the spell.

Quickened Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, you can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

Subtle Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell, you can spend 1 sorcery point to cast it without any somatic or verbal components.

Twinned Spell PHB p102[–] When you cast a spell that targets only one creature and doesn't have a range of self, you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to target a second creature in range with the same spell (1 sorcery point if the spell is a cantrip).

To be eligible, a spell must be incapable of targeting more than one creature at the spell's current level. For example, magic missile and scorching ray aren't eligible, but ray of frost and chromatic orb are.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1Tw58hAwktDDX0EP_description
attribs.current:
5th-level sorcerer optional feature

You can tap into your inner wellspring of magic to try to conjure success from failure. When you make an ability check that fails, you can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll the d20, and you must use the new roll, potentially turning the failure into a success.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG1TwLsUeZ4ZBufY78_description
attribs.current: At 20th level, you regain 4 expended sorcery points whenever you finish a short rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG2iTRzlF83MAWQtBZ_description
attribs.current:
A partir do nível 1, sua conexão com seu Ancestral Dracônica lhe confere a capacidade de realizar baforadas mágicas, para isso vocêdeve substituir um de seus ataques quando utilizar a ação Atacar. A tabela Ancestral Dracônico indica o formato, área e tipo de dano que sua Arma de Sopro Mágica tem.
Criaturas na área de sua baforada devem fazer um teste resistivo apropriado a sua Linhagem Dracônica com CD de 8 + seu modificador de Carisma + seu bônus de proficiência, recebendo 2d8 de dano num fracasso e metade em um sucesso.
O dano aumenta de acordo com os seguintes níveis de feiticeiro: 3d8 no 5ºnível, 5d8 no 11º nível, e 8d8 no 17º nível.
Você precisa realizar um descanso curto ou longo para recuperar o uso dessa característica.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG497aTsRptXShQVjd_description
attribs.current:
A medida que a magia flui pelo seu corpo, ela faz com que os traços físicos do seu ancestral Dracônico surjam. No 1° nível, seu máximo de pontos de vida aumenta em 1 e aumenta em mais 1 sempre que você ganhar um nível na classe.
Além disso, partes da sua pele são cobertas com escamas lustrosas de dragão. Quando você não estiver utilizando armadura, sua CA será igual a 13 + seu modificador de Destreza.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG6Z3dp2aiIsLZ-FgI_description
attribs.current: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG6Z3fYinOPNzsPqig_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG6Z3i3dXSPliyLHVu_description
attribs.current: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: Smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG6Z3jSy3tXvHOryBw_description
attribs.current: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG6Z3n-lQcFIGeDNp-_description
attribs.current: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuG9GH4W5fzeNvmaTn6_description
attribs.current:
Pré-requisito: Capacidade de conjurar pelo menos uma magia

Quando você ganha esse talento, escolha um dos tipos de dano a seguir: ácido, elétrico, fogo, frio ou trovão.
As magias que você conjurar ignoram resistência a dano do tipo escolhido. Além disso, quando você rola o dano para uma magia que você conjurar que causar dano desse tipo, você pode rerrolar qualquer 1 ou 2 no dado, porém deve ficar com o novo valor. Você pode escolher esse talento diversas vezes. A cada vez que o fizer, você deve escolher um tipo diferente de dano

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuGf1FuyrkK1idFohw5_description
attribs.current:
Pré-requisito: Raça Draconato ou Feiticeiro de Linhagem Dracônica

Você desenvolve escamas e garras que relembram seus ancestrais dracônicos. Você ganha os seguintes benefícios:

Aumente seu valor de Força, Constituição, ou Carisma em 1, até o máximo de 20.

Suas escamas se endurecem. Enquanto não estiver vestindo armadura, você recebe +1 em sua CA. Você pode usar um escudo e ainda assim ganhar esse benefício.

Você faz crescer garras retráteis das pontas dos seus dedos. Estender ou retrair as garras não requer nenhuma ação. As garras são armas naturais com as quais você pode fazer ataques desarmados. Se atacar com elas, o dano será igual a 1d6 + seu modificador de Força ou 1d8+ seu modificador de Força caso você esteja com as duas mãos livres. Esse dano pode ser cortante ao invés de concussão.
Seus ataques desarmados são considerados ataques com armas para propósitos de cumprir requisitos.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuGeUqPi8EcMMB1ddlD_description
attribs.current:
Pré-requisito: Raça Draconato ou Feiticeiro de Linhagem Dracônica
Sua característica de Ancestralidade Dracônica é acentuada, você recebe os seguintes benefícios:
Aumente seu valor de Força, Constituição, ou Carisma em 1, até o máximo de 20.
Ao invés de exalar energia destrutiva, você pode gastar um uso do seu traço Arma de Sopro ou Arma de Sopro Mágica para rugir, forçando cada criatura a sua escolhaa até 9 metros de alcance a fazer um Teste de Resistência de Sabedoria (CD igual à sua baforada).
Uma criatura automaticamente tem sucesso no teste se ele não puder ouvir ou vê-lo. Em caso de falha, a criatura fica amedrontado de você por 1 minuto, ela pode refazer o teste no final de seus turnos, terminando o efeito em caso de sucesso e ficando imune ao mesmo por 24 horas.
Seu traço de Arma de Sopro ou Arma de Sopro Mágica pode gerar uma nova forma de baforada: Escolha um ponto a 18 metros de você, ao arremessar sua baforada nesse ponto, uma esfera de 1,5m de raio é criada e explode no local selecionado. O dano, tipo de teste resistivo e CD são iguais ao uso de sua baforada.

attribs.name: kingdom_drop_data
attribs.current: {"Level":"3","Range":"60 feet","School":"Abjuration","Source":"5etoolsR20","Classes":"Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Eldritch Knight Fighter, Redemption Paladin, Watchers Paladin, Arcane Trickster Rogue","Category":"Spells","Duration":"Instantaneous","Material":"","Components":"S","Casting Time":"1 reaction, which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell","data-RangeNum":"60","data-description":"You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.","Higher Spell Slot Desc":"When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used."}

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOfcFAVHlLExuexs5v_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOfcFAVHlLExuexs5v_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOfcFAVHlLExuexs5v_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOfcFAVHlLExuexs5v_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOitOOHeklBbpCT-U8_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

This spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level (2d12), 11th level (3d12), and 17th level (4d12).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOjadmvtl-189gvt02_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOjatMTnz6ImhqwLjZ_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.

If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it.

If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOjeQ2Ac-sZJl7FqMg_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOk1A2mlHZyEZ7YDKk_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You drive a disorienting spike of psychic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 1d6 psychic damage and subtract 1d4 from the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.

This spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach certain levels: 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOk1A2mlHZyEZ7YDKk_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkBGBCNoW1kjGPX7g_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkBGBCNoW1kjGPX7g_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkBT4HJhMFtjMPPeV_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, roll an additional 2d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkBT4HJhMFtjMPPeV_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkBT4HJhMFtjMPPeV_spelldescription
attribs.current:
This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber. Roll 5d8; the total is how many hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose within range are affected in ascending order of their current hit points (ignoring unconscious creatures).

Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell falls unconscious until the spell ends, the sleeper takes damage, or someone uses an action to shake or slap the sleeper awake. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.

Undead and creatures immune to being charmed aren't affected by this spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkBT4HJhMFtjMPPeV_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature inside a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkh6oazWLLQNaIssH_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-NuOkh6oazWLLQNaIssH_spelldescription
attribs.current:
As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-NuOkhNqHWGpuyA-lZIU_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-NuOkhNqHWGpuyA-lZIU_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a small crystal or glass cone

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-NuOkhNqHWGpuyA-lZIU_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-7_-NuOkhcYhUPqVUo2zaga_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range. The area of the storm consists of up to ten 10-foot cubes, which you can arrange as you wish. Each cube must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another cube. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes 7d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried. If you choose, plant life in the area is unaffected by this spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOkhtnMzVtN2Gcxb1V_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target's speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

When the spell ends, the target can't move or take actions until after its next turn, as a wave of lethargy sweeps over it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-NuOki7vEocmbAAljWE1_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-NuOki7vEocmbAAljWE1_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: a small, straight piece of iron

attribs.name: repeating_spell-5_-NuOki7vEocmbAAljWE1_spelldescription
attribs.current: Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. This spell has no effect on undead. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-8_-NuOkiMX1Zzy0ZsULVUe_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A swirling cloud of smoke shot through with white-hot embers appears in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range. The cloud spreads around corners and is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

When the cloud appears, each creature in it must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 10d8 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

The cloud moves 10 feet directly away from you in a direction that you choose at the start of each of your turns.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-8_-NuOkiMX1Zzy0ZsULVUe_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range when it appears or when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-9_-NuOkibp8VqfayAIh0Kn_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point you choose must make a Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 20d6 fire damage and 20d6 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one fiery burst is affected only once.

The spell damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-9_-NuOkibp8VqfayAIh0Kn_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on four different points you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-NuOkis5lUECTlx-1nud_spelldescription
attribs.current:
This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form. An unwilling creature must make a Wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect. The spell has no effect on a shapechanger or a creature with 0 hit points.

The transformation lasts for the duration, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies. The new form can be any beast whose challenge rating is equal to or less than the target's (or the target's level, if it doesn't have a challenge rating). The target's game statistics, including mental ability scores, are replaced by the statistics of the chosen beast. It retains its alignment and personality.

The target assumes the hit points of its new form. When it reverts to its normal form, the creature returns to the number of hit points it had before it transformed. If it reverts as a result of dropping to 0 hit points, any excess damage carries over to its normal form. As long as the excess damage doesn't reduce the creature's normal form to 0 hit points, it isn't knocked unconscious.

The creature is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its new form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech.

The target's gear melds into the new form. The creature can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-NuOkj6UKIoBbIRSFKaV_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional ray for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-NuOkj6UKIoBbIRSFKaV_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several.

Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-6_-NuOkjal0Qw0hAgnhsV8_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 6d8 radiant damage and is blinded until your next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't blinded by this spell. Undead and oozes have disadvantage on this saving throw.

You can create a new line of radiance as your action on any turn until the spell ends.

For the duration, a mote of brilliant radiance shines in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. This light is sunlight.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-NuOkjwK41e0Jzr-brf9_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-NuOkjwK41e0Jzr-brf9_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-4_-NuOkjwK41e0Jzr-brf9_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature within its area when it appears

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOpVNFeZzh4wHFjdp6_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You cause a cloud of mites, fleas, and other parasites to appear momentarily on one creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, or it takes 1d6 poison damage and moves 5 feet in a random direction if it can move and its speed is at least 5 feet. Roll a d4 for the direction: 1, north; 2, south; 3, east; or 4, west. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks, and if the direction rolled is blocked, the target doesn't move.

The spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-NuOpVNFeZzh4wHFjdp6_spelltarget
attribs.current: One creature you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuOrcgECOlNibmP2ErG_description
attribs.current:
Quando você casta uma magia que de dano da seguinte lista, você pode utilizar 1 ponto de feitiçaria para trocar o tipo de dano para outro da lista: Fogo, Acido, Frio, Eletricidade, Veneno e Trovejante.
Você pode usar Magia Transmutada mesmo que você já tenha usado uma opção diferente de Metamágica durante a conjuração da magia.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuOrz4ZRJuq57L9MP4K_description
attribs.current:
Quando você conjurar uma magia que obriga outras criaturas a realizarem um Teste de Resistência, você pode proteger algumas delas. Para tanto, você deve gastar 1 ponto de feitiçaria e escolher um número de criaturas que deseja proteger, sendo o máximo igual ao seu modificador de carisma (mínimo de uma criatura). Uma criatura protegida, não sofre efeito algum ou dano da magia.
Você pode usar Magia Cuidadosa mesmo que você já tenha usado uma opção diferente de Metamágica durante a conjuração da magia.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuOsz5Z5VYgdOUA2dCG_description
attribs.current: Quando você conjurar uma magia que tenha um tempo de conjuração de 1 ação, você pode gastar 2 pontos de feitiçaria para mudar o tempo de conjuração para 1 ação bônus para essa magia.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-NuOuCvy3LPuLmBBNoT1_description
attribs.current:
Quando você conjura uma magia que obriga uma criatura a realizar um teste de resistência contra o seu efeito, você

pode gastar 3 pontos de feitiçaria para dar desvantagem a um alvo da magia no primeiro teste de resistência feito contra ela.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOxJz3FNHUaMOR-o7p_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOxJz3FNHUaMOR-o7p_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-NuOxJz3FNHUaMOR-o7p_spelldescription
attribs.current: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
